q: Five Pokémon types have five letters, what are they?
Jill Valentine, Chris Redfield and Barry Burton are from which video game series?
The Koopalings first appeared in which Super Mario game?
The original Sonic the Hedgehog game was released on the Sega Genesis in which year?
In which year was Final Fantasy VII, Mario Kart 64, Castlevania: Symphony of the Night, GoldenEye 007, Curse of Monkey Island AND Theme Hospital released?
a: 1997. Possibly the best year in video game history.

q: The Johto region was the setting for which Pokémon games?
Super Smash Bros. Melee features how many characters?
a: 25 (26 if Zelda and Sheik are considered separate) characters

q: The ghosts in Pac-man are called Inky, Blinky, Pinky and...?
What year was Nintendo founded?
What video game company collaborated with SONY on the Playstation?
a: Nintendo. The original plan was to make an add-on to the SNES, but the deal fell apart.

q: Mario was in the original Donkey Kong game, but he wasn't called Mario. What was his name?

Steam Gardens and Forgotten Isle are lands in which Super Mario game?
Super Mario 2 had a different name and different characters in Japan. What was it called?
In Super Mario, what are small Thwomps called?
What is the name of Yuna's first Summon in Final Fantasy X?
Which Final Fantasy enemy uses the move 'Bad Breath'
Nearly every Final Fantasy has a character with this name, what is it?
Princess Peach used to be called 'Princess Toadstool' in Europe and the Americas, when did we first here her name as 'Peach'?
a: In the letter at the opening of Super Mario 64
